overview: Anything can happen when eight delectable Peach Girls gather for an all-night slumber party. The champagne flows, hidden fantasies are exchanged and the clothes come off as Mackenzie and her sexy friends cut loose in this girls only sleepover. The action gets hotter when our lovely ladies realize that they are being secretly watched...by none other than you! Outrageous, erotic, and 100% fun...just another Girls Night In!
title: Girls Night In
